member.name: P:mjjames.WebControls.YMP.EmbedInHead
member.summary: Specifies whether the YMP JavaScript should be added into the HTML Head (Default) or at the bottom of the page

member.name: P:mjjames.WebControls.YMP.DevelopmentVersion
member.summary: if set to true uses the latest development version of the player "This version is buggy and unreliable but has bleeding-edge functionality."
